description: This file provides utility functions to manage environment variable mappings between a generic format and framework-specific formats, using YAML templates to define these mappings. It includes functions to resolve template paths, parse YAML templates, apply prefixes, map variables in both directions, and detect supported frameworks based on directory structure.

methods.name: Path get_template_path(framework: str)
methods.description: Constructs and returns the path to the environment template file for a given framework.

methods.name: Tuple[Optional[str],Dict[str,str]] parse_template_file(template_path: Path)
methods.description: Parses a YAML template file to extract an optional prefix and a mapping dictionary.

methods.name: Dict[str,str] apply_prefix_mapping(common_env: Dict[str, str], prefix: str)
methods.description: Prefixes all environment variables in a dictionary with a given prefix.

methods.name: Dict[str,str] map_common_to_framework(framework: str, common_env: Dict[str, str])
methods.description: Maps a set of common environment variables to framework-specific variables based on template definitions.

methods.name: Dict[str,str] map_framework_to_common(framework: str, framework_env: Dict[str, str])
methods.description: Maps framework-specific environment variables back to common variable names based on template definitions.

methods.name: list get_supported_frameworks()
methods.description: Detects and returns a list of supported frameworks based on directory structure.

ctags.name: apply_prefix_mapping
ctags.pattern: /^def apply_prefix_mapping(common_env: Dict[str, str], prefix: str) -> Dict[str, str]:$/

ctags.name: map_common_to_framework
ctags.pattern: /^def map_common_to_framework(framework: str, common_env: Dict[str, str]) -> Dict[str, str]:$/

ctags.name: map_framework_to_common
ctags.pattern: /^def map_framework_to_common(framework: str, framework_env: Dict[str, str]) -> Dict[str, str]:$/
